author: Louise Radnofsky, Ben Cohen
title: Why Second Wave Could Be Even Worse for Sports...
description: Why Second Wave Could Be Even Worse for Sports... (First column, 10th story, link ) Related stories: Live from Roger Goodell's Basement: It's the NFL Draft... BRONCOS Player Tests Positive...
content: The September sports calendar is suddenly packed. In addition to the usual Saturdays and Sundays filled with college and professional football, the lineup now includes the Kentucky Derby, the Tour de France, two rescheduled marathons, golf tournaments and ten… [+262 chars]
